subject: FROM OFFICE OF THE WESTERN UNI
body:
FROM OFFICE OF THE WESTERN UNION MONEY TRANSFER.
ADDRESS/120 South LaSalle Street Chicago, IL 60603 United States.
Dear beneficiary,
Since you did not want to receive your US$750,000.00 US DOLLARS,it has to be canceled and then diverted into the government purse as unclaimed funds, so you have to choose and sign  neither ( Yes or No), as listed below.
You are advised to comply immediately you receive this E-mail to enable us carry out our duties effectively and urgently as we have scheduled because all necessary arrangements have been completed on your behalf. Be rest assured that immediately we receive the activation fee today, we will purchase your file and your entire transfer valued of $750,000.00 Dollar within 5hours and commence with the release of your daily payment $2,500 each daily withdrawal until your funds is completely transferred to you as we agreed on your service after the meeting held with the Tender Board of Directors.
ENCLOSE YOUR FIRST THE PAYMENT DETAILS THAT WAS SENT!
WWW. WESTERNUNION.COM    TRANSACTION DETAILS:
https: // www. westernunion.com/ca/en/web/global-service/track-transfer        
TOTAL FUND TO RECEIVE IS:   US$750,000.00 UNITED STATES DOLLARS OKAY.
Money Transfer Control Number (REF)#847-899-4234
Sender Name: MRS Joy FRANCIS
MTCN:….#847-899-4234
TEST who sent?
TEST MRS Joy
AMOUNT:$2,500 dollar
We advise that you visit our website www. westernunion.com and go to track, put in the senders name and (mtcn)#847-899-4234 and see that your First payment of $2,500 USD is there but we need the above stated fee of $25.00 USD to redirect the transfer to you for your easy pick up.
“Note that 
within 72hrs if you do not remit the required fee of $25 the transfer will be retrieved back and remember that the payment details given to you does not bear your name as the receiver until you make the required payment of $25.00 USD then we will put your name as the receiver.
We preferred gift cards because the fee is too small so Choose your preferred gift card below and purchase it.
Steam Wallet Gift Card
Ebay Gift Card
Apple Gift Card
Yours
Sincerely,
Coordinator MRS Joy FRANCIS
Western Union Coordinator.

subject: Re: FROM OFFICE OF THE WESTERN UNI
body:
Hello MRS Joy FRANCIS,

Thank you for your email. I'm quite intrigued by this opportunity, although I must admit, it's a bit confusing to me. Could you please clarify a few things?

Firstly, could you explain why my name isn't currently listed as the receiver of the payment? Also, how does purchasing a gift card help in this process? 

Secondly, I'm not sure I understand what you mean by "the transfer will be retrieved back". Does that mean the money will go back to its original source or somewhere else?

Lastly, could you provide more details about these daily payments? How much would each payment be and how long would they continue?

I appreciate your patience with my questions. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lester
